name: One Tile Man
description:
One Tile Man is a 2D Precision Platformer. Featuring tight obstacles with very little room for mistakes, it will put your skills to the test. It offers uniquely designed levels with intractable objects, moving platforms, and precision movement to advance through the stages. This Early Access build is to get some feedback on the level design and mechanics of the game to move forward with the design process and polish the game to it's best possible state before the official full game release. Be sure to post your feedback in the Community Hub and join our Discord for the latest news and discussions.

One Tile Man uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2020, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.”
